backend/main.mo: Actor that includes and exposes blob storage mixin functionality.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short summaries of their functionality and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, favicons, theme colors, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/README_DRAFT_ONLY.md: Draft documentation describing implemented updates, review steps, and modified files before production release.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes with About as the default page, and wrapping in theme and query providers.
frontend/src/components/FaviconLoader.ts: Empty placeholder component file for dynamic favicon loading logic.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout with reordered navigation, mobile menu, header, footer, and persistent WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Floating WhatsApp chat button opening a prefilled message in a new tab.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status tracking, and stored-identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook that checks readiness of the backend actor for future integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color themes, typography, scrollbars, and utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp deep link with a predefined phone number and encoded message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the professional About page with profile, overview, and WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudiesPage.tsx: Displays case studies with context, challenges, approaches, tools, and outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Shows professional certifications and technical stack using cards and categorized sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission via FormSubmit.co plus CV download and WhatsApp link actions.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage featuring rotating taglines, BI service highlights, WhatsApp CTA, and credibility metrics.
frontend/src/pages/ImpactPage.tsx: Displays categorized BI impact achievements with descriptions and measurable outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows detailed BI service offerings including problems, deliverables, and outcomes, with navigation and WhatsApp actions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current SPA state, version, and a list of existing features with descriptions covering routing, pages, components, and contact functionality.
